Wellington College under-15 v Aotea College under-15: Rugby coaches stood down after ref, players abused https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-college-under-15-v-aotea-college-under-15-rugby-coaches-stood-down-after-ref-players-abused/EEOC7KRBYRGYTFHWYOKSSW4HKM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-college-under-15-v-aotea-college-under-15-rugby-coaches-stood-down-after-ref-players-abused/EEOC7KRBYRGYTFHWYOKSSW4HKM/ Cherie HowieCoach's foul-mouthed tirades spoiled teens' ‘great game’ - witness Sat, 01 Jun 2024 03:06:37 +0000 The coaches of a Wellington College rugby team have been stood down for six matches after a game had to be abandoned because of foul-mouthed abuse towards the referee from the sideline.
